title: Are conservatives and republicans really transphobic? lets find out
selftext:
Aight, we all know those radical leftists who call conservatives transphobic. But are we REALLY transphobic? If everyone isn't, that would be epic to show any democrats that say stuff like that ;)

​

Are you okay with transgenders and their rights?

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/j2yqaq)
